description: watercolor study for a print; portrait, nearly in profile from PL, of man wearing a hat with a purple silk tie with tassels; brightly-colored garments--light green with blue, green and brown circular patterns, and bright blue with predominately white flower or crane pattern; grey ground; some embossing
marks:
Inscription

in right margin, in red and black:
title: The Actor Ichikawa Ebizo as Togashi in Kanjincho
